fields.headline: Bringing sweet potatoes to the digital era
fields.headerText: Dataatti assists in developing modern applications and websites for your company. Our specialty is user-driven software to make everyday business easier. We don’t think anyone should spend time on manual work that could be automated with software.
fields.servicesTextOne: We can assist in software development from the ideation stage all the way to maintenance. We offer turnkey solutions so that the customer can focus on their own special expertise. We do software development in a user-oriented manner to ensure the finished product serves its users in the best possible way. We make software success through comprehensive user research and continuous validation.
fields.servicesTextTwo: Are IT solutions unfamiliar to your business? Do you feel the need for digital transformation but don't know where to start from? We help you with needs assessment which allows us to find the correct solutions for the challenges. By using already available solutions such as Microsoft Office 365 and Google Workspace brilliant results can be achieved in a cost effective way.
fields.servicesTextThree: Nowadays over half the people using internet are using mobile devices. Mobile application reaches users without a hassle and keeps the service in the user's mind. With modern tools, like PWA, development of mobile applications is really cost effective and fast.
fields.aboutText: Dataatti is Turku based company specialized in software development. Dataatti offers user orientated software solutions, that aims to ease clients everyday life. Our team is young and innovative: Dataatti actually got founded after [winning Turku city hackathon.](https://www.turku.fi/uutinen/2020-10-30_hackathonin-voittajaideaa-kehitetaan-kaupungin-avoimen-tiedon-palveluksi "News about winning the Turku city hackathon") We have comprehensive expertise in many areas and we are constantly following new trends in the industry.
fields.meetOurTeamText: Our team of young and passionate professionals is always willing to help with every problem.
fields.seoDescription: Dataatti assists in developing modern applications and websites for your company. We help you with problems considering digitalization.

fields.name: Aleksi Väisänen
fields.introduction: Aleksi is an energetic guy who likes to balance coding with jogging. Aleksi has a background with health technologies and ship building, which has helped him to broaden his problem solving skills.
